name: Loop Advance
description:
Loop Advance is a short puzzle-platformer created for Wowie Jam 3.0.

The theme of the Jam was "Failure Is Progress". I took this theme and ran with it creating a game where when you die your old body becomes a platform for you to use later. HOWEVER, I also require you to complete the levels in a set amount of time, this time can be increased by collecting clocks. This allowed for some brilliant puzzle design and fun platforming. 

NOTE:

When downloading make sure you choose carefully between windows and android. Windows is a .exe file and android is a .apk file.

Thank you for playing, I hope you enjoy.
